document_notes.text:
This update for djvulibre fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2021-3630: out-of-bounds write in DJVU:DjVuTXT:decode() in DjVuText.cpp (bsc#1187869)

notes.text: An out-of-bounds write vulnerability was found in DjVuLibre in DJVU::DjVuTXT::decode() in DjVuText.cpp via a crafted djvu file which may lead to crash and segmentation fault. This flaw affects DjVuLibre versions prior to 3.5.28.
notes.title: Vulnerability Description

description.text: To install this SUSE Security Update use the SUSE recommended installation methods like YaST online_update or "zypper patch".
